TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapMethodAttribute extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class SoapMethodAttribute Inherits SoapAttribute

summary.span: 替方法自訂 SOAP 產生和處理。

span.span: Customizes SOAP generation and processing for a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目標物件屬性都可以從遠端叫用的方法。The target objects for the attribute are methods that can be remotely invoked. 套用自訂 SOAP 產生和處理。Apply the to customize SOAP generation and processing. 此屬性的屬性可讓程式設計人員自訂 SOAPAction HTTP 標頭欄位，表示 SOAP HTTP 要求的意圖。Properties of this attribute allow the programmer to customize the SOAPAction HTTP header field to indicate the intent of the SOAP HTTP request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用中的成員自訂 SOAP 產生和處理方法的類別。The following code example shows how to use the members in the class to customize SOAP generation and processing for a method. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute#100](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute/CPP/demo.cpp#100)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute/CS/demo.cs#100)]

summary.span: 取得或設定做為對目標方法的方法回應的 XML 項目名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element name to use for the method response to the target method.

value.span: 做為對目標方法的方法回應的 XML 項目名稱。

span.span: The XML element name to use for the method response to the target method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值是方法的 「 回應 」 附加至名稱的字串。The default value of this property is the string "Response" appended to the name of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定用於這個方法所傳送 HTTP 要求的 SOAPAction 標頭欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets the SOAPAction header field used with HTTP requests sent with this method.

summary.span: 這個屬性目前尚未實作。

span.span: This property is currently not implemented.

value.span: 用於這個方法所傳送 HTTP 要求的 SOAPAction 標頭欄位。

span.span: The SOAPAction header field used with HTTP requests sent with this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性目前尚未實作。This property is currently not implemented. SOAPAction HTTP 要求標頭欄位指出的 SOAP HTTP 要求的目的。The SOAPAction HTTP request header field indicates the intent of the SOAP HTTP request. 如需有關的 SOAPAction 欄位的詳細資訊，請參閱 www.w3.org/tr/soap/#_Toc478383528。For more information on the SOAPAction field, see www.w3.org/tr/soap/#_Toc478383528. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出目前屬性的目標是否將序列化為 XML 屬性以代替 XML 欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the target of the current attribute will be serialized as an XML attribute instead of an XML field.

value.span: 目前的實作 (Implementation) 永遠傳回 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法設定屬性屬性。The property cannot be set on the attribute.

span.span: An attempt was made to set the current property.

summary.span: 取得或設定在目標方法的遠端方法呼叫的序列化期間 (Serialization) 所使用的 XML 命名空間。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML namespace that is used during serialization of remote method calls of the target method.

value.span: 在目標方法的遠端方法呼叫的序列化期間所使用的 XML 命名空間。

span.span: The XML namespace that is used during serialization of remote method calls of the target method.
